mapper.select: SELECT T.CO_CD , T.PRJCT_CD , T.COPRT_CD , T.TNKEY_YN , T.CLNT_CD , T.MAKR_CD , T.PRJCT_NM , T.PRJCT_ADDR_ZIP , T.PRJCT_ADDR , T.PRJCT_ADDR_SUB , T.PRJCT_MNG_NM , T.TEL_NO , T.LOSS_RATE , T.STRT_DT , T.END_DT , TO_NUMBER(T.TOT_WT) / 1000 AS TOT_WT , T.MNG_ID , T.ODR_NO , T.ODR_DT , T.USE_YN , T.RMK , T.PRJCT_MES_CD , T.ETC_FIELD1 , T.ETC_FIELD2 , T.ETC_FIELD3 , T.CREAT_ID , T.CREAT_PGM , T.CREAT_DTTM , T.UDT_ID , T.UDT_PGM , T.UDT_DTTM , T.ORD_TYP , T.BILDNG_TYP , T.ENGRK_TYP , T.MAKR_MNG_NM , T.CLNT_EMAIL , T.CLNT_FAX_NO , T.PRCSN_UPR , T.DC_DIV , T.PRDT_UPR , T.CPLR_YN , T.PMNT_MTD_CD , T.SHOP_CLNT_CD , T.SHOP_UPR , T.CTRT_RMK , T.OUTORD_UPR , T.OUTORD_LOSS_RATE , T.OUTORD_MNG_NM , T.OUTORD_TEL_NO , T.OUTORD_FAX_NO , T.WH_CD , T.SALES_AREA_CD , T.PCHS_STRT_DT , T.PCHS_END_DT , T.CLMN_DAY , T.CLMN_RMK , T.CLMN_DIV_CD , T.SCND_WH_CD , T.THRD_WH_CD , T.PCHS_CLNT_CD , T.OUTORD_MNG_ID, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.MAKR_CD) AS MAKR_NM, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_ID = T.CO_CD) AS CO_NM, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_NM, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE CLNT_CD = T.SHOP_CLNT_CD) AS SHOP_CLNT_NM, MNG_ID AS SALES_MNG, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.MNG_ID) AS MNG_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(STRT_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') as STRT_DT2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') as END_DT2, TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') as CREAT_DTTM2 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.PCHS_STRT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PCHS_STRT_DT2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.PCHS_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PCHS_END_DT2, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.CLMN_DIV_CD) AS CLMN_DIV_NM, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.CLMN_DIV_CD) AS CLMN_DIV_NM, (SELECT CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 BM02 WHERE BM02.CLNT_CD = T.PCHS_CLNT_CD) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM, (SELECT MAX(TNKEY_CF_YN) FROM TB_SD09M01 SD09 WHERE T.PRJCT_CD = SD09.PRJCT_CD ) AS TNKEY_CF_YN, (SELECT MAX(TNKEY_CF_DT) FROM TB_SD09M01 SD09 WHERE T.PRJCT_CD = SD09.PRJCT_CD ) AS TNKEY_CF_DT FROM TB_SD05M01 T WHERE PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQ_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORD_REQ_DT ,B.CLNT_CD AS ORD_CLNT_CD ,A.WH_CD AS ORD_WH_CD ,A.SCND_WH_CD ,A.THRD_WH_CD ,ADDR_MAIN AS ORD_ADDR_MAIN ,ADDR_SUB AS ORD_ADDR_SUB ,CONCAT(CONCAT(B.ADDR_MAIN,' '),B.ADDR_SUB) AS ORD_ADDR ,TO_CHAR(B.ORDRG_PROC_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORD_ORDRG_PROC_DTTM ,C.ORDRG_WT AS ORD_ORDRG_WT ,C.REAL_DLVR_WT AS ORD_REAL_DLVR_WT FROM TB_SD05M01 A, TB_OD01M01 B, TB_OD01D01 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJCT_CD = B.PRJCT_CD AND B.ORDRG_SEQ = C.ORDRG_SEQ AND B.PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REQ_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SMT_REQ_DT ,A.WH_CD AS SMT_WH_CD ,ADDR_MAIN AS SMT_ADDR_MAIN ,ADDR_SUB AS SMT_ADDR_SUB ,CONCAT(CONCAT(B.ADDR_MAIN,' '),B.ADDR_SUB) AS SMT_ADDR ,TO_CHAR(B.SHIP_DTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SMT_SHIP_DTTM ,C.SHIP_WT AS SMT_SHIP_WT ,C.REAL_SHIP_WT AS SMT_REAL_SHIP_WT FROM TB_SD05M01 A, TB_AR01M01 B, TB_AR01D01 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJCT_CD = B.PRJCT_CD AND B.SHIP_SEQ = C.SHIP_SEQ AND B.PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}

SELECT T.CO_CD , T.PRJCT_CD , (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE PRJCT_CD = T.PRJCT_CD) AS PRJCT_NM , T.PRJCT_SEQ , T.PRDT_DIV PRDT_DIV_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_DIV) AS PRDT_DIV_NM , T.PRDT_STKN PRDT_STKN_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_STKN) AS PRDT_STKN_NM , T.SIZE_LIST PRDT_SIZE_NM , T.LOSS_RATE , T.CPLR_UPR FROM TB_SD05D01 T WHERE T.PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}

SELECT CLNT_CD, CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 WHERE 1=1
AND CLNT_CD LIKE '${searchValue}%' AND CLNT_NM LIKE '${searchType}%'
SELECT * FROM TB_SD05M01 WHERE 1=1 AND PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}

SELECT COUNT(B.PRJCT_CD) + COUNT(C.PRJCT_CD) + COUNT(D.PRJCT_CD) + COUNT(E.PRJCT_CD) CNT FROM TB_SD05M01 A, TB_AR01M01 B, TB_AR03M01 C, TB_OD01M01 D, TB_SD04M01 E WHERE A.PRJCT_CD = B.PRJCT_CD(+) AND A.PRJCT_CD = C.PRJCT_CD(+) AND A.PRJCT_CD = D.PRJCT_CD(+) AND A.PRJCT_CD = E.PRJCT_CD(+) AND A.PRJCT_CD = #{prjctCd}
SELECT CODE_ID PRDT_DIV_CD, CODE_NM PRDT_DIV_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 WHERE CODE_KIND = 'PRDTDIV' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_STKN) PRDT_STKN_NM , PRDT_STKN FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDivCd} AND PRDT_STKN IS NOT NULL AND FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_STKN) IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PRDT_STKN
SELECT CM05.CODE_ETC AS CLNT_CD , BM02.CLNT_NM FROM TB_CM05M01 CM05 INNER JOIN TB_BM02M01 BM02 ON BM02.CLNT_CD = CM05.CODE_ETC WHERE CM05.CODE_ID = #{makrCd}
